mapper.select: /* 유진 설비기준 최신시간 온도모니터링 리스트 (mpMapper.getTmpr10List) */ select a.spot_no --작업장번 , a.spot_nm --작업장명 , b.rcv_msg --메세지 , b.rcv_tmpr --측정온도 , to_char(to_timestamp(b.unix_hms) ,'MM월DD일 HH24:MI:SS') as rcv_tm --수신시각 from spot_info a join tmpr_log b on a.spot_no = b.spot_no and b.used_yn = 'Y' and b.cust_no = a.cust_no join (select spot_no, max(unix_hms) as unix_hms from tmpr_log where used_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = #{custNo} --and to_char(to_timestamp(unix_hms),'YY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YY-MM-DD') group by spot_no ) c on b.spot_no = c.spot_no and b.unix_hms = c.unix_hms where a.used_yn = 'Y' and a.cust_no = #{custNo} order by spot_nm limit #{pageSz}

/*유진물산 초기화면 금속검출기 통과수량 (dash10Mapper.getFinalMetalDetect) */ select to_char(to_timestamp(a.unix_hms),'MM월DD일 HH24:MI:SS') as pass_tm , a.rcv_msg , a.pass_qty --통과수량 , a.err_qty as fail_qty --금속검출수량 , fn_get_prod_name(a.prod_no) as prod_nm , round(case when a.pass_qty = 0 then 0 else 100 - (a.err_qty / a.pass_qty) * 100 end,2) as achv_rt from metal_log a join cust_info b on a.cust_no = b.cust_no and b.used_yn = 'Y' join (select max(metal_hstr_no) as metal_hstr_no from metal_log where cust_no = #{custNo} --and to_char(to_timestamp(unix_hms),'YY-MM-DD') = to_char(now(),'YY-MM-DD') ) c on a.metal_hstr_no = c.metal_hstr_no where a.cust_no = #{custNo}
